inn1.comm: fuller length and he gets some movement away from the bat, beating Fletcher who pushes forward rather meekly
pitches it up again, 121ks, gentle wobble off the seam from not too far from off stump and Fletcher leaves this ball be
121ks again but this time he fractionally holds back the length and the ball sits up off the track to beat Fletcher, that is good bowling from PK
fuller ball, starts to move this one back in but its too far from outside off stump, Fletcher strides forward and shoulders arms, taking the ball on the pad, clearly struck outside the line
another inswinger, swings in and hits the front pad and this one is missing leg and too high so the appeal for lbw is turned down

edged and taken! Praveen gets a wicket with a good ball, following up three outswingers and two inswingers with another away-moving delivery, this one gets the outer edge and first slip takes it to his left
pitches it up outside off and the batsman hits the ball to point
back of a length and he steers it to backward point
beaten as he pushes down the wrong line, that ball was pitched up just outside off and held its line as Powell got back to try and cover off stump
fractionally fuller in length as Nehra searches for movement, its not too far from off stump and now Powell opts to leave
gem! Again Nehra pitches the ball up and gets movement to beat the bat as Powell again pushes down the wrong line, feet not moving forward
a straighter one now and Powell defends it back
full ball outside leg stump, hits the pads, cant be out
pitches outside leg again, gentle swing, this time he defends
again outside leg and swinging down, Smith tries to work the ball away but is late on the shot and the ball runs off his pads
pitches up outside off stump and gently comes in, Smith stabs at the ball and it rolls to the leg side
wider ball and he easily covers off stump and shoulders arms
gets across and defends to round off another maiden over
speaking of runs, there's four of them! Nehra drags the ball down wide outside off stump and Powell cracks it away off the back foot past extra cover
fuller ball brings Powell forward hesitantly, bit of outswing and the ball runs down along the ground into the gap at backward point
full outside off, by about a foot, swings in and Smith leaves it be
full again and he drives it firmly to the man at cover
back of a length, cuts back in from outside off, tapped for a single
good ball, back of a length on the stumps and Powell defends
full and angling across, tempting the bat but Smith leaves
overpitched and Smith drives into the gap at extra cover, Harbhajan runs after it but the ball wins that race
a bit too straight and he tucks it past square leg for three
pitches outside off stump and shapes back close to the batsman but he's got the sticks covered and leaves it be for Dhoni
cuts back in from around off and he defends it back
again he serves it up full and gets movement but the batsman leaves
outside off, goes for a shot and misses
on the pads and turned away past square leg for two
hits a length, batsman is early into his drive, too much bottom hand, and the ball rolls back to Nehra
better defensive stuff this time, getting across to cover off stump and defend the ball back to Nehra
pitched up, doesn't get the desired swing and Smith plants himself forward and punches a sweet cover drive for four, top placement for him there
too straight so Smith hops across and knocks the ball for one
pitches it up outside off to lure a false shot and gets it too, Smith chasing without much foot movement and getting beaten by the subtle movement back in
hits a length and this time Smith shoulders arms
comes forward to cover the swing and defends well to point

hello dolly! Short ball! Praveen digs it in and gets sharp lift off the track, the ball cuts back in sharply at good height and surprise Smith who falls back and hangs the bat out, the ball takes the outer edge and flies back over Dhoni safely
back to full and straight and Powell thuds forward in defense
sees a full ball and swishes at it, beaten by a fair ways
ah, well bowled! Nehra pitches it up to get Smith pushing at the ball and then moves the ball away from the outer edge
good shot! Wasn't a short ball but Smith picked the length and swatted it down into the ground into the gap at midwicket
back of a length outside off, bit of room, Smith flashes it down through the gap between the slips and gully for a single

good ball and that is edged! Superb delivery from Nehra, going back to his strongest area, pitching the ball up to get some swing and succeeds in getting the outer edge of Powell's bat as he just pushes at a gem of a delivery
strays down the pads and Dowlin tucks the ball off his pads

another one, down to a loose shot! Smith goes this time, just chasing a back of a length ball outside off that gently deviates after pitching, he hangs his bat out and Dhoni makes no mistake, Smith really should have gotten in line but was nowhere
back of a length on leg stump and defended to midwicket
pitches wider and leaves him but he reaches out and slaps the ball to backward point
wrong line, down the pads and worked around the corner for one
pitches it up, gets some movement, batsman plays it out
swings down the pads from a full length, Reifer stabs it and it gets an inside edge down into the gap at short fine leg
too full and down the leg stump, ball clips a bit of the pads and Dhoni dives to collect

dropped by Karthik who tries to take it from second slip! Nehra pitches it up and moves the ball away, Reifer is sucked into the poor shot and the ball takes the edge and is heading towards Dravid at first slip but Karthik interferes and muffs the take
full and going away and Dowlin shoulders arms
on the pads and worked to the man at midwicket
back of a length on the stumps and Dowlin defends well
again back of a length, Dowlin gets in line and defends
a wee bit wider and he forces it to the off side, cant find the gap
pushes forward to a full ball and drives it down to mid-off
short ball strays well down the leg side for a wide

easy catch and this time it is Karthik who takes it! Praveen pitches it across Reifer and he pokes at a ball he could have easily let be, pays the price, edging an easy catch that Karthik, at second slip, cups to his left
hits a length and Bernard steers it down to backward point

now its the inswinger, pitched up on middle and leg and moves down a fair ways, Dowlin stabs at the ball and misses, Taufel reckons it was doing too much and replays show the ball would have missed leg stump
pitches up outside off and no shot offered
struck on the pads again, just outside the line, turned down
pitches outside leg stump, he gets across the sticks and works the ball into the gap behind square leg
again too straight and Dowlin pushes the ball to midwicket
gets back and hits the ball with too much bottom hand to cover
tucks the ball off his pads to square leg
full just outside off, swings back in and hits the bat high on the front flap, struck ever so marginally outside the line and turned down by Taufel, but superb bowling
bangs it in and gets good carry to Dhoni after Bernard leaves
hits a length on middle and off and Dowlin defends uneasily
short of a length and dabbed off the back foot to cover
shoulders arms to one pitched up wide of off stump
hits a length on middle and off and deviates, defended off the back foot
wrong line, down the leg stump, hits the pads and rolls away
back to a full length and that immediately gets PK some inswing, but the batsman is also ready to the task and smothers the movement with a long stride
hits a full length to get the batsman defending the ball to point
short and wide, Dowlin reaches out to cut but ends up toe-ending the ball down into the ground in front of point
oversteps and bowls it wide, Dowlin chases and misses
full and wide, bad ball, Dowlin flashes and misses, wide called
caught but it won't count, Dowlin runs down and flays the bat at another ball that would have been called wide, slashes it up and extra cover takes it
wide half volley, chases it and beats cover for one
full ball, gets forward and defends soundly to cover
shoulders arms to one pitched up wide of off stump
back of a length on the stumps, hint of seam, defended to point
slashes a full and wide ball square on the off side for one
another inswinger, gets back and works the ball to midwicket
leans into a full ball and drives down to mid-off, well stopped
gentle seam-up stuff, gets the batsman steering past backward point
slow bouncer outside leg stump and Dowlin leaves it be
good ball to end the over, back of a length and defended
wide ball, slashes at it end gets a thick outside edge past gully
full again, he too chases it and misses out
firm little push there, just leaning and driving the ball to extra cover
good shot, collects the ball from middle and leg and picks the gap at square leg, into the wide spaces and the sweeper cannot get there in time
ah, beaten! Pushes at a ball which hits a length and slowly deviates
straighter ball, bit of cut back in, pitches middle and off and Bernard defends with a thin inside edge
starts off with a terrible short ball outside off and it gets the treatment, hammered into the gap between midwicket and mid-on
lovely bowling, short and wide outside off stump, a real freebie, and this one is slapped into the gap at cover for four more .. superb captaincy this!
full this time down the pads and pushed to midwicket
well now, a wicket, and played on! Dhoni pitches the ball up much fuller and Dowlin defends, getting a thin inside edge that hits off stump, don't know how many saw that one coming
back of a length and defended to the off side
on the stumps and pushed to midwicket
drives it down the ground for a single, Harbhajan fails to hit the stumps
comes onto the front foot and opens the face, steering a single
pitched up again, driven to extra cover comfortably
pitches on off stump and Sammy defends it back
full again on off stump, pushed square on the off side, sets off, Dhoni collects and fires flat  throw but can't connect
change of pace, pitched up and that is well pushed to extra cover
pitches it up outside off stump, ball clips the pad and they appeal for a catch
on the stumps and pushed to the off side for one
too straight and that one is nudged to midwicket

good ball, gets some swing back in off a full length, the ball cuts back and there is a noise as the ball slips between bat and pad, Karthik dives full stretch but cannot collect ... runs signalled so yes, there was bat on ball
tapped away for a single
full outside off stump and gets sharp swing away from the batsman, the umpire calls wide
back of a length and he pushes the ball to point
sharp turn and some bounce, spins down the pads, Karthik takes
spins back from outside off, batsman gets over the ball and runs it past slip
spins down the pads again, Sammy doesn't play a shot and Karthik collects and breaks the stumps
turns in again from just outside off, this time Sammy whips it fine
lunges forward to one tossed up outside off, much slower, and pads the ball away to the leg side, good turn on view so far from Harbhajan
flights it outside off again and Bernard gets a long way forward
spins away from a short length and Sammy hits it into the off side
plenty of air on that one, dips into Sammy who drives to cover
tossed up on middle and leg and Sammy defends it back
spins away from just outside off and Sammy watches it go
turn again but the length is too short so Sammy goes back and bunts the ball past midwicket out to Nayar in the deep
too short and so even with the sharp turn Sammy can go back and hit the ball to cover
too fine and Bernard brushes it off his pads for one
good bounce on this one, Sammy gets over it and defends
tosses it up, Sammy gets well over the turn and defends
turn and bounce again but Sammy waits for the last second before turning the ball around the corner, very well played
comes forward to a fuller, flatter ball and whips it to midwicket
slows the pace, lands it on a length and he plays it back
goes through with a free flow of the arms, driving a flighted ball over cover
flights a legbreak and he comes forward to defend
sharp turn, Bernard gets back to steer the ball fine but misses
fuller in length and he drives off the front foot to cover
again too much room and that is square-driven on the off side
slower and straighter ball, the googly, on-driven for an easy two
spins in and he plays at it, beaten for turn and bounce, the ball kissing his pads and ballooning up to the leg side safely
tossed up and defended
slower and fuller, gets Bernard across and tries to whip the ball but is beaten for turn
gets across and defends
strides a long way in, ball turns in and again takes the pads
uses his feet to try and whip a flatter ball away but inside-edges
googly, hurries into him off a short length and he gets a bit of wood on the attempted cut, flashing the ball down to backward point
slower ball on the stumps, Sammy defends it back watchfully
again too wide and Sammy cuts it away on the off side
slows the pace, flights it up, and Bernard plays it to cover
stabs at another googly and the ball dribbles in front of midwicket
flights it outside off stump, no turn and he leaves it alone
flat ball on leg stump, turned with the spin around the corner
slower one, pushed it through and he stabs at the ball
not much turn, straighter one, patted back down the track
flat and straight ball, defended back to Harbhajan
uses his feet to take it on the full, clipping past midwicket
slower one, the doosra, hits him outside the line as he plays forward and tries to work it across the pads for a single, the ball balloons up and a wide slip takes it
gets back and pushes a short ball into the off side
no turn, wide ball, gets back and cuts the ball wide of gully
again he offers room and Sammy slaps it down to Nehra in the deep
good shot, stands tall and punches it to cover for one more
some turn now, Bernard gets a long way in and defends
well held on the second attempt! Mishra persists with the ball flighted wide of off stump, Bernard goes for the cut and edges, Dravid juggles at first slip and holds on
spins in with the angle, he goes back and bunts it to midwicket
reaches out and slaps a fuller ball into the off side

spins in from off stump, defended to midwicket, sets off, Sammy charges out and then has to dive to make hit home as Dhoni hits the stumps, it is referred but not out is the call as Harbhajan collects and deflects the ball with the bat just across the line
spins away and he plays the ball straight to point
comes forward, then back, and plays the ball away
tucked around the corner to short fine leg
too wide, reaches out and cracks the ball past the covers
slower one, gets back and over the bounce and hits it to cover
straighter, quicker one on middle and leg, just manages to get bat on ball
googly, but too short and wide and he gets over the bounce to back-cut it with superb placement, that was asking for trouble
again he gets turn but its too wide, a cramped cut into the off side
spins back in, he is again cramped but manages to cut it away
and he strikes first ball! Sammy gets one leg up, ala Lara, and swats a short ball off his pads but its in the air out to deep square leg where Mishra takes it above his head, fumbles, and latches on
leaves him with the angle across and no shot offered
pitches on a length and he plays the ball to cover
pitches on leg and swings it in, he pushes it down the track
short of a length and he drops the hands to allow the ball pass
comes onto the front foot and pushes the ball to cover
change of pace, slides the ball across the batsman who plays and misses
quicker ball slides in and strikes him high on the front flap as he shapes to flick across the line, that was too high and doing too much and he was well down
spins in and beats him on the forward press, goes down the pads
spins down and takes the pads
slower through the air, defended off the front foot
flatter ball, worked off the pads past square leg
tosses it up, slows the pace, gets some turn back in and beats an ambitious drive, the ball sneaking back in to disturb the stumps
slowly tosses up the legspinner, easily left alone
spins away again, sharp turn, again left alone for Dhoni
gets across and leaves it be
goes hard, goes straight and goes over mid-on, Praveen collects and parries the ball back in
gets back and defends to the off side
slower ball, no turn, defended back
shot! Uses his feet and swings the ball over mid-on for six
spins down the pads, tucked wide of the catcher
topspinner on off stump, gets over it and defends to the off
spins down and he turns the ball to short leg
straighter ball, gets back and runs it wide of slip
tossed up and he gets a long way forward to defend
slower ball on leg stump, good dip on that one, patted back
full outside off stump, lets it go to Karthik
presses him right back on the crease and Roach turns it to square
leans into a half volley and drives that excellently between the covers
full on off stump, confidently played to extra cover off the front foot
snorter surprises him, spitting up off a cracker off a shorter length and he removes a hand off the bat as he uneasily plays it back down safely
bouncer down leg stump, Roach flinches as a wide is called
on the pads and worked into the gap at square leg for one
tossed up and defended
spins back in and he works the ball back
and he makes himself felt first ball, does Gambhir! Roach stabs forward to one tossed up outside off stump and pops up an inside-edged catch to silly point
goes back and defends to the off side
presses forward and smothers the turn
oh, close! Stays low and turns in sharply to beat the attempted cut
starts off full and Miller drives to extra cover with fluency
back of a length and Tonge drives off the back foot to extra cover
slow cutter off a shorter length, he feels for it off the back foot and misses, the ball dies as Karthik takes
gets back and tall to punch the ball into the off side for one
too short and that one is pulled superbly into the gap at square leg, beating the sweeper giving chase in the deep

all over and off rush the Indians to the dressing room! Tonge goes for another pull to one banged in much shorter, he's hurried into the shot and Praveen holds the simplest of top edges as West Indies are bowled out for 129 in 36 overs

inn2.comm: back of a length to begin with and he gets beaten on the shot
gets back and turns the ball to square leg
hits a fuller length and beats Karthik as he feels for it
tries to work the ball to the on side and gets a leading edge toward cover
pitches up wide of off stump and Karthik looks to the umpire
bangs in a short ball on middle and leg , Karthik gets up and defends
short of a length and he taps it and calls for the one
again short of a length and Karthik plays it off the back foot to point
hits a length outside off and it goes to the wicketkeeper
short of a length and he gets in line to defend
pitches it up, Karthik defends, the ball rolls off the inside edge to the leg side, Gambhir calls him for the sharp single and they set off, Karthik seems in pain as the ball hit him in the midriff
pitches it up outside off stump, no bat on ball and thats the over
gets back and works the ball down to deep point for one
fuller ball, middle and leg, bunted to midwicket for a quick one
short of a length, quick and sitting up, 152ks, Gambhir gets up and flashes and misses
good shot, gets some room and steers the ball between cover and point, was wide enough for him to get back and use the pace of Roach for four
gone! Short of a length and angling in to Gambhir, who opens the face to try and steer the ball down but it sits up and he gets an inside edge that dislodges the bails
positive shot to begin with, Dravid hopping and shuffling to work a short ball sliding down the pads for four
gets up and plays the ball away for one

bad call and bad effort! Its on the stumps and Dravid counters the inward movement with a tap to midwicket but then runs off on a poor single, he's always been a bit of a shaky runner, especially when beginning, and is run out as the ball hits the stumps without a long reach of the bat, very sloppy stuff
short of a length and he gets up on the toes to defend
leans into an overpitched ball outside off stump and finds the gap at extra cover, very well played by Karthik
short ball jags back in and he is late to defend, takes it on the thigh
pitches it wide of off stump and he shoulders arms to end the over
short of a length on the stumps and he plays it back
good ball and good pace, sits up off a length and gets Kohli playing it down from in front of his face, aggressive stuff from Roach
and again! Roach steams in and gets one to sit up from outside off stump, 150ks, and Kohli hops and sways
slower ball slips out as a wide full toss and Kohli square-drives
good use of the wrists gets him two now, clips from off the stumps and finds the gap at midwicket
fuller in length on off stump and he defends watchfully
short of a length outside off and more watchful play from Karthik
hits a fuller length about a foot outside off and Karthik leaves
dug in short on leg stump, he hops up and fends it to square leg
beaten on the drive without much footwork, just chases a slower, fuller ball and misses
short ball, 133ks, he drops the wrists and leaves it be
gets a good way forward and defends a fuller ball back
starts off with a good length and that gets Karthik defending
hits a good length, marginally fuller, and beats a loose prod
stands tall and punches the ball back to Sammy
gets some inswing off a fuller length, Karthik drives to cover
swings back in with the angle, back of a length, and he defends
he seems happy just defending, though Kohli calls him for a single
shoulders arms to one pitched up just outside off stump
drives hard at a full ball and loses a hand, slashing an edge wide of gully
gets right in line and defends to cover, telling Karthik to stay put
hits a length, off stump or thereabouts, Karthik comes onto the front foot and taps the ball to backward point
overpitches this time and Kohli flashes a drive to a diving cover
back of a length but Kohli hangs on the front foot, then steers to point
stands up and defends a length ball down to backward point
pokes at one leaving him off a length outside off, feeling for it, and gets an edge that does not carry to Reifer at first slip
turns a fuller ball to square leg and sets off, the fielder is slow and they get two, running hard, it was Roach who came in and tried to pick it up in the deep
pitches it up to get some swing, Kohli gets in line and defends
pushes forward to one cutting back in from outside off stump and gets an inside edge to the leg side
gets across his stumps and works a straighter ball for a single
drives at one pitched up on a length and plays it to point
aims for the yorker but doesn't get it right, Kohli drives it to mid-on
reaches out and slashes a wider ball in the air but he's hit that hard and into the gap between two fielders on the off side for four
swings down leg stump, Kohli mistimes the flick and gets annoyed
wider and shorter ball and he slaps it behind point for a single
short of a length and punched on the rise to the man at cover
pitches it up on the stumps and there's an inside edge to midwicket
on-drives the ball off the stumps down to mid-on
gets right back in his crease and defends down to the off side
short in length and Kohli pulls from outside off stump, not entirely a short ball but he just goes over midwicket's fingertips
taps the ball off the back foot to point, where Powell dives and fumbles
watchfully played by Karthik, patting a fuller ball back to Sammy
starts off on a length and Kohli defends
strays too fine and Kohli picks it off his pads down to the sweeper

good ball, pulled back in length and its rears up off the surface just outside off stump, he feels for it and misses as the ball flies by, Fletcher collects and asks the question then Roach slowly follows but no reaction from the umpire
back of a length and he gets in line to defend
gets back and flat-bats the ball into the gap at midwicket, standing up and short-arm-jabbing it .. its a no ball so we have a free hit
makes room and slices the ball off the toe of the bat past gully
short of a length and Kohli defends to backward point
good ball, beats the bat outside off stump with sharp carry
fluent drive, keeping still and piercing the gap at extra cover, reached out and punched it very well, neat shot from Karthik
straighter ball, just back of a length and he defends
back of a length again and he drops the head to defend
better length, fuller and cutting back in as he feels for it with a sizable get between bat and pad, gets in inside edge past leg stump
too straight and he taps it to midwicket, sets off and gets shooed back
gets in line with the ball and defends it back
a bit fuller in length and he gets forward this time to defend
tries a bouncer over the stumps and Kohli ducks low
stands leaden-footed and fishes outside off stump, beaten by one that sits up sharply
short ball, lets it come on and then drops it in front of point
now he goes fuller and Kohli cracks the ball behind point for one
no footwork as he flashes at one pitched up and swinging away outside off stump and he is beaten
well bowled, hits a full length again a bit closer to off stump and cuts the ball past Kohli's bat, he started to feel for it and tried to hold back but that was beaten
comes onto the front foot and starts to play, then opts to leave as the ball leaves him and it clips the under edge of the bat and rolls down the ground
hits a length to Karthik, pressed on the back foot in expectancy of the short ball, and he adjusts to bring the bat down inside the line
goes back again and pushes the ball to point
fuller on middle and off and he pushes it down the track
gets up and pushes the ball square on the off side
pushes at the ball and it straightens past the outer edge
fuller ball angles back in and Kohli defends to point again
flays the bat at a full ball outside off stump and misses due to the back of footwork, but this is a no ball so he can try again on the free hit
big full toss, beamer almost at his chest and Kohli goes for the pull and just manages the splice of the bat on the ball, it runs down wide of gully and immediately Taufel signals no ball for height
swings and misses at one outside off, 147ks, gets good lift
gets to the pitch of a full ball and drives straight to mid-off
gets forward and pushes the ball toward the off side
gets onto the front foot and pushes the ball to cover
fullish ball, starts to angle in and straightens, Kohli is keen to work the wrists and pick runs past midwicket but has to adjust to push the ball down the track
gets across and pushes the ball to the fielder again
stands back and works the ball across the line toward mid-on
shorter in length and he forces it off the back foot to point
chases one outside off stump and inside-edges back past the keeper, Best runs around at fine leg and slides to stop the ball, his feet just stop inside the ropes
plays across the line to one angling in off a length and misses, getting struck high on the flap
goes back to work a shorter ball to midwicket and it pops back in the air but doesn't carry close to the bowler
goes to pull a short ball and misses outside off stump
poor ball, slides well down the pads for a wide
there's a six! Kohli pulls it off superbly, transferring the weight and picking the shorter ball over cow corner for half a dozen
chases a slower ball outside off stump and chops it back onto his back foot, wincing in pain as the ball then dribbles to the off side
back of a length and he taps it to point, Karthik sends him back
advances down and slices a full ball over backward point, not where he wanted to go but he gets runs square on the off side
gets back and bunts a length ball wide of midwicket
this one leaves him slightly off a length and beats him for carry, he was neither forward nor back and just sort of hung the bat out
short of a length again and this time he gets bat to ball, defending
again he is forced onto the back foot and defends, Kohli is keen to get down the other end but there's no chance as the bowler keeps running forward to collect
beaten again with one that is marginally fuller and leaving him as he pushes at it with no footwork
pitches it up and gets some movement, Kohli pats it back
plays a pure shot and gets beaten, he comes onto the front foot and then tries to dab the ball but it sits up and skims the bat
straighter and fuller and he works it across to midwicket
nips back off a shorter length and he turns it toward square leg
slower ball, leans into it and mistimes the drive to cover
gets forward and taps the ball to point for a quick single
opens the face and steers a wide ball behind point for one
leaves one be outside off stump
hits a good length and he gets over the ball to defend
guides the ball past gully for one to third man
turns a shorter ball in the air just wide of square leg and gets two
fuller ball gets him onto the front foot and pushing to cover
back of a length and he defends it off the back foot
gets up and thrashes a wide ball in the air backward of point
stands in his crease and goes to force the ball away and gets an inside edge onto his back leg, the ball rolls to point
shorter ball and he runs it to gully and Kohli calls and sprints off
defends a fuller ball off the front foot
well played, just clips the wrists at the last second and picks the gap at square leg, really a good shot
gets forward and pushes the ball to the off side
full and straight and Karthik defends again
gets onto the front foot and pushes the ball to point
full outside off stump and he twirls the ball as he leaves
pushes at one that is much closer to off stump and is beaten
fuller and cutting back in, he uses his feet and drives it back to the bowler who fumbles it
flashes at one outside off stump and misses for the nth time

loud appeal as this one hits the seam and seams back in sharply, catching Karthik high on the flap as he gets up to work it away, they continue appealing but Taufel shakes his head and replays show he is correct in doing so
much fuller and wider and he shoulders arms
nips back in from a full length outside off and Karthik turns it to square
gets in line and defends ever so watchfully to the off side

another big shout as Kohli walks across his stumps and misses out on the attempted flick, the bowler appeals and appeals but Taufel is unmoved, probably was missing leg stump with the angle it was taking ... and that's what Hawkeye shows as well
gets forward and presses the ball away
comes on the walk and pushes the ball to the man at cover
gets further down and defends the ball firmly to the off side
fuller ball, he uses his feet to manufacture a shot but mistimes it
pitches on a good line and he .. drum roll ... defends again
full ball in search of swing and Karthik ... yes, you guessed it ...
full and straight, a bit too straight in fact and Kohli misses the attempted nudge, the ball rolls off his pads
pushes the ball to point where Sammy collects, throws, and misses
gets up and slashes the ball past a diving Sammy at backward point and the man from third man cannot get there in time to prevent four
shot! Overpitched and Kohli drives that very straight back past the bowler and stumps, just leaned into it and used the wrists
oversteps, pitches short of a length and Kohli defends to cover
slower ball, very full and wide, Kohli slogs and misses, wide called
good ball to get when you're on 48 and its a free hit, and Kohli takes full toll, slamming the slower length ball over mid-on for four to raise his second ODI half-century, well played
short of a length outside off and he defends off the front foot and misses
tossed up on a length, some turn as Karthik pushes to cover
sweeps from middle and leg for an easy single
flatter ball outside off, some turn, Kohli pushes off the back foot
tosses it up and Karthik gets forward to smother the ball
turns the ball off his pads to square leg
goes back and drives the ball down to mid-on
short of a length and he pulls out to Walton, the sub, at deep midwicket
stands up on the toes and forces the ball between cover and point
leans into a fuller ball and carts if over mid-off by some distance

good catch at mid-on by Dowlin! Karthik looks to keep going for the shots but flat-bats a length ball up over the bowler's head, it was miscued but looked like it may fall safe but Dowlin ran across to his left and plucked it with ease
full ball and he comes forward to defend
back of a length and Nayar pushes the ball to point
drives one hard but short cover dives and saves runs, well stopped
short and he gets back to hit the ball firmly to the off side
tosses it up and gets some turn, Kohli starts pressing forward but then goes back to push the ball to cover
uses his feet and hammers the ball along the ground past Miller out to long-off
flashes a cut and misses
goes back and works the ball toward midwicket for one
comes onto the front foot and pushes the ball to cover
bangs in a short ball that flies to Fletcher behind the stumps
works a short of a length ball behind square leg for one
slower ball outside leg which Nayar turns to midwicket
comes forward and defends the ball to the off side
change of pace and length, Nayar feels for the shorter ball and misses, then it doesn't carry to Fletcher
fuller and wider and he leaves it be for Fletcher
comes out and gives it some stick, sending it high over mid-off for six
flatter ball drifts down the pads and he gets a small leading edge as he shapes to work it to midwicket
cuts and misses
rocks back and slaps a short ball between midwicket and mid-on
makes room and punches the ball to short cover
goes back again and drives it back to Miller, who misfields
slower ball ends up a low full toss which he puts away past midwicket
top-edges a pull to a short ball and safely beats midwicket
good yorker, just manages to skim the bat and stops in its tracks
uses his wrists and on-drives the ball to midwicket
another attempted yorker on the stumps, worked past square leg
very full on leg stump and Nayar turns it to midwicket
comes out and mistimes the drive but manages to beat mid-off for a single that gets India to their only win in the tournament, Kohli finishing unbeaten on 79
